headline: Why The QuidelOrtho (QDEL) Story Is Shifting As Analysts Rework Growth And Valuation Assumptions
summary: The blended fair value estimate for QuidelOrtho shifted from US$38.33 to US$34.67, a change of about 9.5% in the modeled price target. This adjustment sits alongside a split analyst backdrop, with some firms lifting targets and others trimming them as they revisit how quickly growth and profitability assumptions might play out. As you read on, you will see how these moving targets shape the evolving narrative around QuidelOrtho and what to watch next in the research updates. Analyst Price...

headline: How The Investment Story For USA TODAY (GCI) Is Shifting With New Targets And AI Deals
summary: The latest analyst update on USA TODAY lifts the fair value estimate from US$6.40 to US$7.12, giving you a refreshed reference point for how the stock is being modelled. That change is tied closely to differing analyst opinions, with more optimistic voices pointing to room for upside and more cautious ones highlighting how sensitive the new target is to underlying assumptions. As you read on, you will see how this evolving narrative might shape the way you track the story from here. Analyst...
